name: SSF1
title: CS Site-Specific Factor 1
subtitle: Measured Thickness (Depth)
notes: **Note**:  Code measured thickness (depth) of tumor (Breslow measurement), not size. Record the actual measurement in hundredths of millimeters (mm) from the pathology report.
rows:
0.01    - 9.79 millimeters (mm)
(Exact measurement to nearest HUNDREDTH of mm) 

Examples:
    001    0.01 mm
    002    0.02 mm
    010    0.1 mm
    074    0.74 mm
    100    1 mm
    105    1.05 mm
    979    9.79 mm

Not applicable:  Information not collected for this case
(May include cases converted from code 888 used in CSv1 for "Not applicable" or when the item was not collected.  If this item is required to derive T, N, M, or any stage, use of code 988 may result in an error.)
Microinvasion; microscopic focus or foci only and no depth given
No histologic examination of primary site

Unknown or no information
Not documented in patient record
